Translations.Text: So they ist. When they boarded ship he bore yumma it He said ona bore yumma it Robit drown its ludia? Ona committed nieco hrozny
He said ja nie say ona stand mozem bol mna
He said ja bol sorry Nie punish mna moj zabudlivost; nie bol i harsh mna
So they ist. When they schodza young chlapec he killed him. He said ona kill such innocent clovek kto nie kill iny clovek? Ona committed nieco horrendous
He said ja nie tell ona ona stand mozem bol mna
He said ja ziadat ona about anything inak, potom robi nie keep mna ona! Ona seen enough apologies mna
So they ist. When they zastihnut certain obec they ziadat ludia food they refused host them! Skoro they zalozit wall collapse he fixed it He said Ona ziadat wage ze
He said Teraz my part podnik. Ja explain ona everything ona nie stand
Mat rad for ship it belonged do chudobny fishermen ja chudoba render it zavadny! There bol king pojdem after them zhabat kazdy ship forcibly
Mat rad for chlapec jeho rodicia bol dobry believers my saw he burden them jeho transgression disbelief
My willed tvoj Lord zastupid jeho miesto iny syn; jeden je lepsie righteousness laskavost

Mat rad for wall it belonged do 2 orphan chlapec mesto. Pod there bol treasure belonged do them. Because ich otca bol righteous clovek tvoj Lord chudoba them do grow attain full strength potom vypis ich treasure Such bol zlutovanie tvoj Lord Ja robit ziaden z ze z moj own volition. This bol explanation things ona nie stand
